archimate:Requirement.name: SM.2.4.1: There should be documented standards/procedures for incorporating information security into all stages of the M&A process, which include initial deal-making, due diligence, pre-integration planning and integration activities.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
